ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] I just want to let you know!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ((HUGS)) Paria!! Did I thank you for joining! Always great to see fellow Spellbinders. :-) whee. 477 more emails to go. fun fun fun. luv, -Su ... datarate.txt
ygData.messageBody:
((HUGS))
Paria!! Did I thank you for joining!
Always great to see fellow Spellbinders. :-)
whee. 477 more emails to go. fun fun fun.
luv,
-Su

> Please direct me to where I can learn more about serverfilter and
datarate.txt modifications. That was a new one to me!
>
> Paria 36 Necro
>
> Tribunal
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: alexander.jones@...
> [mailto:alexander.jones@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 03, 2002 2:34 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] I just want to let you know!!!!
>
>
> you need to fiddle around with the user interface some to understand how
it
> works. Most things are reachable through /commands in the chat bar. try
> /help and read some.
>
> You also have a hot key bank, you need to assign skills to buttons and
> probably you will want put the button in your hot-key bank. try to
structure
> it early into types of banks. Combat, traveling and so on. find a system
> that suits you.
>
> If you want to delve into the more advanced commands then maybe perhaps
> affix sense heading to your slam button or something like that. This will
> max out Sense heading very fast. Or filter out your hits out of the
chatbox,
> this gets annoying fast when you got double attack and dual wield. hard to
> read things then.
>
> There are many many things that makes the ui better, there is no set way
of
> whats good and bad just preference. IT also varies as yo pass through
> levels.
>
> If you like to raid a lot and are playing in large groups, remember
> serverfilter is your friend and DONT forget to set your datarate.txt to
> appropriate value. Your friends will love it even more than you not having
> to wait for ld people all the time.
>
> But I think you have some learning to do before this, keep it up.
> Experiment, learn. dont just take it from everyone else.
>
> /Ranina
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: muaddib74447 [mailto:muaddib1974@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 03, 2002 3:07 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] I just want to let you know!!!!
>
>
> Hi,
> I am really impressed with the game!!!! I love how everyone is so
> help full and willing to give money and items. It has real help me. I
> want to know somethings though, How do you yell a message? How do you
> Speak yout of person? how do you Add to ones friends list? And, How
> do you learn things like sence heading? I have alot of other
> questions. I am hoping that I am not going to make anyone mad.
>
>
>
